entry.title: NIGHT CELTIC HIT TEN – WITH ONLY TWO GOALSCORERS
entry.summary: CELTIC hit hapless Hamilton Accies with a ten-goal hurricane exactly FIFTY-FIVE years ago as Bobby Lennox and Stevie Chalmers went on the rampage in an unforgettable evening in the east end of Glasgow.
